response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value and has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you for an exclusive price of $14,500. This represents a special discount tailored for someone with your discerning taste and requirements. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. We're confident you'll find this investment worthwhile.", "product_price": 14500}
